job.title: Full-Stack Engineer (Angular/React Native & AI/ML)
job.description:
We are seeking an experienced Full-Stack Developer to join our dynamic team at a crucial time of growth and technological evolution. You will play a key role in enhancing our current SaaS platform, which is built on Angular and .NET/C#, while also focusing on building out a new, cutting-edge version of our app using React Native. This role requires a creative and analytical mindset to integrate AI and ML into select features, such as profile matching and skill assessments, to deliver a more intuitive and predictive user experience.
Responsibilities:

Maintain and enhance our existing Angular-based SaaS platform, ensuring high performance, reliability, and seamless user experience.
Collaborate with our team to design and develop a new React Native application, with a focus on mobile-first design principles.
Lead the integration of AI and ML technologies to create intelligent features such as predictive analytics, automated matching, and personalized user journeys.
Work closely with the data science team to implement machine learning models that enhance the platform's capabilities.
Participate in the full development life cycle, including requirement analysis, architecture design, coding, testing, deployment, and maintenance.
Write clean, scalable, and well-documented code across the full stack.
Stay abreast of developments in web applications, programming languages, AI/ML trends, and SaaS industry best practices.
Qualifications:

Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field.
Proven experience as a Full-Stack Developer with a strong portfolio showcasing your work with Angular and React Native.
Familiarity with .NET/C# and transitioning legacy systems to modern JavaScript frameworks.
Practical experience with AI and ML implementations in a production environment.
Strong proficiency in JavaScript, including DOM manipulation and JavaScript object model.
In-depth knowledge of modern HTML/CSS and responsive design.
Experience with RESTful APIs and asynchronous request handling, partial page updates, and AJAX.
Proficient understanding of code versioning tools, such as Git.
Excellent problem-solving skills and the ability to work independently or as part of a team.
Strong communication skills and the ability to translate complex technical concepts into easy-to-understand language for stakeholders.

customFields.generatedDescriptionAI:
We are looking for a talented Full-Stack Engineer with expertise in Angular/React Native and AI/ML to join our team for a 1 to 3-month project. As a Full-Stack Engineer, you will be responsible for developing and maintaining our web and mobile applications using AngularJS, React Native, and Node.js. Experience with Amazon Web Services is also required.

The ideal candidate will have a strong background in AI development and machine learning, as they will be involved in integrating AI/ML technologies into our applications. Proficiency in JavaScript, Angular, and React is essential.

To apply for this role, please submit a proposal detailing how you can contribute to the project. We encourage you to include links to past completed projects that demonstrate your skills in Full-Stack development, Angular/React Native, and AI/ML. We look forward to reviewing your proposals and finding the perfect fit for our team.
